title: Check for Conflict of Interest
description: A reporter has been assigned a story about a company. The editor must check if the reporter has any financial or personal conflicts of interest.

tasks.description: Ask the reporter to disclose if they or any close family members have a financial stake in the company (e.g., own stock).
tasks.expected_outcome: The reporter provides a conflict of interest statement.

tasks.description: Check the news organization's conflict of interest disclosure database for any previously declared interests by the reporter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the reporter's statement against the database.

tasks.description: If a conflict is found, reassign the story to a different reporter.
tasks.expected_outcome: The story is reassigned to avoid a conflict of interest.
